name: Toadally Fair
description:
Life is a roller-croackster.

Asking for a raise definitely requires some luck, but it looks like you packed wrong dice... Welp!

Ignore yourself, seduce a statue and lick your boss to get a raise in this action dice game!

Meet the boss

Roll the Dice

Do something wrong...

Ignore yourself

There is something disturbing about this

Like a red button

Like a sound of a gunshot with a silencer

Like adding snow leopard to the Red Data Book

Credits:

NickZinkler — Game Design

Aki_Kato, Anry — Art

Vaflov, Barsik_Kato — Code

Aljoscha Guenther (joschgu) — Music, Sound Design (https://aljoschaguenther.wordpress.com/)

syRoKs, киберсамурай — Additional Art, Sound Design, Content, QA, Misc

Special Thanks:
